it.polimi.se2018.model.events

Class NextTurn

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.events.ModelUpdate
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.events.NextTurn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NextTurn
extends ModelUpdate
    The event to update the view when the turn of a player is finished, and another player must play it's turn.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo, dvdmff
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
